results.title: Retail Assistant / Manager
results.description: We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.

results.title: Customer Service and Sales
results.description: We have a few positions available for those with good customer service skills who also enjoy a sales environment.The role does not require any cold calling, the products market themselves through online media and local literature to residential markets. Our client prides on their strong training programme.Progression opportunities available, with large potential commission incomes to those whom excel with management opportunities existing.

We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.
results.title: Retail Assistant / Manager
Retail Representative
results.description: Role - Promoting product sales through consumer brochures and/or online, for everyday lifestyle merchandise. Full training is provided.Income - Starting at just above the NMW, income will raise rapidly once a regular customer base is established.Opportunities - Both team leader and business management opportunities exist for the ambitious with unlimited potential income.

Our client, a well established household name, is looking for Sales Retail Advisors and Team Managers to promote household essentials to residential markets via online media or through retail literature.Full training is provided, so involvement in this industry previously is not required.Income is largely performance based, with massive opportunities to progress.

results.title: Ecommerce Manager
results.description: This Ecommerce Manager role is responsible for the day to day management of the Ecommerce team & strategy. This involves: Day to day time & personal management of a team of 6. Continuing to drive traffic to & through the website from homepage to checkout. Improving SEO & PPC performance to help better attract customers. Working on customer journey to increase sales. Strategising online product placement. Managing online sales. Content Management experience. The ideal Ecommerce Manager will have…

The Digital Project Manager role is an important one for the business, who are currently busy catching up when it comes to digital technology. The Digital team are driving a number of changes to the website, covering extra functionality to take the digital presence from a brochure type site to a mobile optimised and complex site. The Digital Project Manager will work on a ticketing system, having a key role in these changes, managing the agency to fullfil digital changes following an 18 month p…
